org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.flowmatrix

Class FlowMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.flowmatrix.FlowMatrix

  • public class FlowMatrix
extends Object
    Class used to represent the flow matrix. A flow matrix is a set of flow matrix lines.
    Author:
    Francois-Xavier Aguessy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private List<FlowMatrixLine> flowMatrixLines
      The flow matrix lines

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlowMatrix()
      Create an empty flow matrix
      FlowMatrix(org.jdom2.Element element, Topology topology)
      Create a flow matrix from a XML DOM element

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accessAuthorized(Interface ni1, Interface ni2, int destinationPort, FirewallRule.Protocol protocol)
      Test if the access is authorized in this flow matrix from the IP of ni1 to the IP of ni2 (using destinationPort and protocol) If the flow matrix is empty (no lines), return always true
      boolean accessAuthorizedFromInternet(Interface ni, int destinationPort, FirewallRule.Protocol protocol)
      Test if the access is authorized in this flow matrix from Internet to the IP of ni (using destinationPort and protocol) If the flow matrix is empty (no lines), return always true
      List<FlowMatrixLine> getFlowMatrixLines()

    • Method Detail

      • accessAuthorized

        public boolean accessAuthorized(Interface ni1,
                       Interface ni2,
                       int destinationPort,
                       FirewallRule.Protocol protocol)
        Test if the access is authorized in this flow matrix from the IP of ni1 to the IP of ni2 (using destinationPort and protocol) If the flow matrix is empty (no lines), return always true
        Parameters:
        ni1 - the source network interface (IP)
        ni2 - the destination network interface (IP)
        destinationPort - the destination port
        protocol - the protocol
        Returns:
        true if the access is authorized, else false.

      • accessAuthorizedFromInternet

        public boolean accessAuthorizedFromInternet(Interface ni,
                                   int destinationPort,
                                   FirewallRule.Protocol protocol)
        Test if the access is authorized in this flow matrix from Internet to the IP of ni (using destinationPort and protocol) If the flow matrix is empty (no lines), return always true
        Parameters:
        ni - the destination network interface (IP)
        destinationPort - the destination port
        protocol - the protocol
        Returns:
        true if the access is authorized, else false.

      • getFlowMatrixLines

        public List<FlowMatrixLine> getFlowMatrixLines()
        Returns:
        all lines of the flow matrix
